fields.Title of Presentation: Teaching a MOOC: Tales from the front lines of massive open online courses
fields.Conference / Meeting Name: Poster presented at the annual meeting of the American Educational Research Association
fields.Description/Abstract: Most articles written about MOOCs over the past few years have unfortunately come from the popular press and were not based on empirical research. While empirical research on MOOCs is increasing, relatively little has been written about what it is like to teach a MOOC. In this mixed methods exploratory study, we set out to capture the perceptions and experiences of instructors teaching massive open online courses. In the following paper, we present the results of our inquiry and implications for practice.
